chop.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: to cut something into smaller pieces

chop.translation[0].definitions[1].defin: to reduce an amount of money by a large amount
chop.translation[0].definitions[1].examp: He suddenly found that his income had been chopped in half.
chop.translation[1].definitions[0].defin: a small piece of meat on a bone, usually cut from a sheep or pig
chop.translation[1].definitions[1].defin: a hard downward movement that you make with your hand
chop.translation[1].definitions[2].defin: the act of hitting something with a sharp tool in order to cut it
